titleStmt.title: A pithie, short, and methodicall opening of the Ten commandements. By Master William Whately, preacher of the word of God at Banburie in Oxford-shire
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.
Lee, Richard, d. 1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Pauier and Leonard Greene [, Cambridge],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
